show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: Bonus 10, Jason Wrich "Take Some Self Accountability"
subtitle: Bonus 10, Jason Wrich "Take Some Self Accountability"
summary:
Welcome back for  special Friday Bonus episode! There's a few new things today that I have been wanting to try.
I'm joined in my home studio by my friend and neighbor, Brendon Wheelock who had some questions about blockchain and Bitcoin, so I called up my friend Jason Wrich and we scheduled a zoom meeting.
This episode is a current events, recorded the day before release, in this episode we discuss the recent crypto meltdown, failure of FTX and how Bitcoin is something totally different. Jason explains self custody and talks about some home mining. I might even be shopping for a miner to help keep me feet warm this winter in the studio!!
